name: Cop Invader VR
description:
1990, cybercrime department facing with a new cyber attack.
Computer Virus GodComplex captured a network of smart toasters and will not allow tens of thousands of ordinary Americans to use this device.
Brutal Cyber-Cop  Michael Banner transform into virus-created simulation,  to end Godcomplex. Stop the fried bread crisis and save walnut oil corporations from bankruptcy!
